sentences.en: A military spokesman was quoted as saying that the border area is now safe.
sentences.cn: 报道引述军方一位发言人的话，说边境地区现在很安全。

sentences.en: Arthur C Clarke likes to quote his friend and fellow SF writer Ray Bradbury.
sentences.cn: 阿瑟·C.克拉克喜欢引用他的朋友兼同事——科幻作家雷·布拉德伯里的话。

sentences.en: Can you quote me an example of what you mean?
sentences.cn: 你能否给我举个例子来说明你的意思?

sentences.en: He drowned in a boating quote "accident" unquote.
sentences.cn: 他在一次所谓的翻船“事故”中溺亡。

sentences.en: He quoted a short passage from the Bible.
sentences.cn: 他引用了《圣经》里的一小段。

sentences.en: I can quote what he said.
I got a number of suppliers to quote me their best prices.
sentences.cn: 我有一些供应商给我开出最优惠价.

sentences.en: Joe was always good for a colorful quote.
sentences.cn: 乔总能绘声绘色地旁征博引。

sentences.en: Please quote this reference number when reordering stock.
sentences.cn: 再次订货时请提供这个编号。

sentences.en: The actor, striking an attitude, began to quote Shakespeare.
sentences.cn: 这位演员装腔作势地开始引用莎士比亚的原文.

sentences.en: The article starts with a quote from an unnamed member of the Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 文章的开头引用了一位未透露姓名的内阁成员说过的话。

sentences.en: The paper starts its editorial comment with a quote from an unnamed member of the House.
sentences.cn: 该报社论以一位匿名议员的引语展开。

sentences.en: The poem is too long to quote in its entirety.
sentences.cn: 这首诗太长,没法全文引用.

sentences.en: This is the best price I can quote you.
sentences.cn: 这是我给你开出的最有利的价钱了.

sentences.en: We'll send you a quote without delay.
sentences.cn: 我们会立刻送一份报价给你。

sentences.en: We've only had an "average", quote, unquote, kind of recession.
sentences.cn: 我们只有过一次被称作“一般性的”经济衰退。

sentences.en: What was that marvellous quote that she came out with?
sentences.cn: 她引用的那句妙语是什么来着？

words.tran_cn: 可引用的；适于引用的；有引用价值的
[贸易] 报价单；引用语；引证

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)引文起——引文止（尤用以强调说话者对所引述文字的不同看法）

trans.tran_en: a sentence or phrase from a book, speech etc which you repeat in a speech or piece of writing because it is interesting or amusing
to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written
to repeat exactly what someone else has said or written
